author: Thomas Jack

changelog.release_notes:
- Added a battery indicator (Future releases will allow to choose style)
- Arranged the text for date and time to allow for easier viewing
- Fixed a bug where the last digit of the date was not showing
- Added Memes

description:
Have you ever wished you could be a memelord on the go? Have you been held back by memes not yet re-invented for portability? If you have answered yes to either of these questions, then this is the watchface for you!

This watchface features Lenny staring back at you in all his glory ready to assist you with both the time and the date. This is a very early release and options for time and date formatting as well as additional goodies will be added as development continues!

latest_release.release_notes:
- Added a battery indicator (Future releases will allow to choose style)
- Arranged the text for date and time to allow for easier viewing
- Fixed a bug where the last digit of the date was not showing
- Added Memes

title: The Lenny Watch
